attributes.action: David Cameron to recall parliament over the behaviour of his Foreign Secretary
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron to recall parliament and explain why The Foreign Secretary William Haigh sees fit not to comply with the legal obligations of the UN in regard to his deliberate attempt to circumvent the UN Security Council, and without the support of the UK electorate. Further to produce all evidence regarding the events leading up to the alleged use by the Syrian government of chemical weapons and, should it be found that the terrorists/ rebels supported by the UK/US and Saudi governments are the guilty party, what action will he take against them?
